results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^floor((e-1)/2).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: Array[Apply[Times, FactorInteger[#] /. {p_, e_} /; p > 0 :> p^Floor[(e - 1)/2]] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 28 2017 *)
program: (Scheme, with memoization-macro definec) (definec (A295657 n) (if (= 1 n) 1 (* (expt (A020639 n) (A004526 (- (A067029 n) 1))) (A295657 (A028234 n)))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 28 2017
